column5: THis is my middle daughter's PB LMB.  SHe is 9 years old and the fish was all hers from the cast to the fight (great fight).  THe only thing I did was net it and take the hook out.
Very nice catch , congrats to her
Shouldn't you be takin' them (and yourself) clothes shopping???  Nice fish. I'm sure she'll always remember that fish.
That's bigger then any largemouth I've ever caught, lol!
I'm more than double her age and I don't have one that good! Nice fish, I bet you're proud!
Easy Rob I still have well over 2 weeks of vacation left. I don't even know what number of the month it is and haven't for about a month now.
Nope, didn't get a weight. I am usually pretty good at guess and I would say around 3.5 pounds.  It might have been 4+ if it was a bit chunkier.
x2 - nice fish.
That's dang awesome
Awesome.  Great to see the kids out enjoying some fishing!
Worm dunker.
THat things a tank! good job!
Thats awesome. Congrats to your daughter for her PB.
That thing is HUGE!
Congrats to your daughter Cudz, the smile says it all!!
Wow that is fantastic. I hope when my daughter is old enough she will love fishing. How old was your daughter when you started teaching her to fish?
Congrats to your daughter, that is a beautiful brute
HAWG DANG!!!
My kids have been fishing since they were really little.  they are liking it more now.  My 5 year old not so much. My 9 and 11 year olds betrter
Stellar fish Chris, my congrats to your daughter.
Awesome fish! Congrats to you both!
Great fish, wish i had one that big!
Awesome!!
Congrats to you & your Daughter on her PB SBK
That's quite an accomplishment, big congrat's to your daughter!
